EmailTemplate.subject: Challenge Training Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
You are receiving this email because you have not registered for training and/or not submitted your work dates. I have resent the offer email for your convenience which includes the training registration link and the Essential Information Form. Please complete and return as soon as possible in order to be placed.
Training for all roles takes place this weekend, please ensure you notify us if you are not able to attend.
Programme Leaders and Assistant Programme Leaders 7th, 8th & 9th June
Senior Mentors 8th & 9th June
Community Mentors 9th June
Please confirm your attendance at the training session and/or select your available work dates as soon as possible. All training details will be made available to you when you have signed on to the event.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
